params.name: logits
params.description: Prediction scores of the next sequence prediction (classification) head (scores of True/False continuationbefore SoftMax).

params.name: hidden_states
params.description: Tuple of tf.Tensor (one for the output of the embeddings + one for the output of each layer) of shape(batch_size, sequence_length, hidden_size).Hidden-states of the model at the output of each layer plus the initial embedding outputs.

params.name: attentions
params.description: Tuple of tf.Tensor (one for each layer) of shape (batch_size, num_heads, sequence_length, sequence_length).Attentions weights after the attention softmax, used to compute the weighted average in the self-attentionheads.
